description: a(n)=(1/2)(n-th number whose base 2 representation has exactly 4 runs).
comments: Numbers with exactly two runs of 1's in binary. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Dec 09 2013
prog: (PARI) runs(n)=my(s);while(n, n>>=valuation(if(n%2,n+1,n),2);s++); sis(n)=runs(n>>valuation(n,2))==3 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Dec 09 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
